name: Dino Chomp
description:
Dino Chomp is a tiny game I made in two days to keep myself productive.

You're a hungry dino, and you're out to get some food! Food gives you score, but it also fills your belly! Choose carefully what kind of food to eat to get the maximum amount of points before you're full! The game is semi-randomly generated every time.

The only controls are the arrow keys! (And enter at the start)

I hope you like this!
